description:
This course is intended for Bernina Software 7 owners who want to learn all the ins and outs of Bernina Software 7.

              This course is not more than 60 min of Bernina Software 7, and the sixteenth course of Master the Fundamentals of Bernina Embroidery Software 7.

            1. To digitizing letters for logos or for any other use, and to combine it with embroidery design, all depend on the end user.
            2. Know the size limitations for specific fonts, as well as underlay and stitch settings.
            3. Outline of lettering gives another outcome, and can be use for just outline type of lettering.
            4. How to search and download fonts you do not have for a project and how to install it so it is accessible for the software.
            1. Shadow lettering is also a big one, as well as the envelope style for lettering.
title: #19/20 Bernina Software 7 the Fundamentals of lettering
